channel.title: Zen sleek - stukk in recovery mode [please help me]
channel.description:
hi.. i'm asking on how to fix my zen sleek... its stukk in recovery mode and i don't know what to do.. iv'e searched google and found some answers but noone of them seems to be working with it...
when i start up i get 4 options
1. Clean up 2. Format all 3. reload firmware 4. reboot
when i click clean up it won't do it... when i click format all it starts and then it stops again... reload firmware is not working and reboot is just to reboot it....
have any of you got an idea of what im going to do????
heres a picture of it
[IMG]http://i621.photobucket.com/albums/tt292/kneistol/IMAGE_013.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i621.photobucket.com/albums/tt292/kneistol/IMAGE_012.jpg[/img]

item.description:

Try the company’s official online support pages for the Zen Sleek.

http://support.creative.com/Products/ProductDetails.aspx

Is this similar to what you’re looking for? I’m not quite sure. Just trying to help.

http://support.creative.com/kb/ShowArticle.aspx?url=http://ask.creative.com:80/srvs/cgi-bin/webcgi.exe/,/?st=73,e=0000000000384368818,k=555,sxi=7,case=obj(63121),kb=ww_english_add,varset=ws:http://au.creative.com
